===Etymology===
From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*s-ta-t||to put; to place}}. Cognate with {{cog|bo|སྟད||to put on; to lay on}}, {{m|bo|སྟ་གོན||preparation; arrangement}}, {{cog|my|ထား||to put; to place}}.

====Definitions====
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{†}} to [[attach]]
#* {{zh-x|附著[着]{zhuó}|to attach}}
# {{†}} to [[touch]]; to [[contact]]
#* {{zh-x|著[着]{zhuó}陸|to land}}
# to [[wear]]; to [[put on]]; to be [[dress]]ed in; [[clothing]]
#* {{zh-x|衣著[着]{zhuó}|clothing}}
#* {{zh-x|冇著[着]衫|naked|C}}
# {{†}} {{lb|zh|dialectal Mandarin|Jin|Wu}} to [[put]]; to [[place]]
# {{†}} to [[arrange]]
# {{†}} to [[blossom]] or [[bear]] [[fruit]]
# {{†}} something to [[depend]] on; something to [[fall back]] on; [[desired]] [[end]]; a sense of [[belonging]]
# to [[catch fire]]; to [[burn]]; to [[combust]]; to be [[ignite]]d
#* {{zh-x|火 @'''著[着]{zháo}''' 得{de} 很 歡。|The fire is burning cheerfully.}}

## {{lb|zh|Cantonese}} to [[turn on]] (a light)
##* {{zh-x|著[着]{zoek6} 燈|to turn on the lights|C}}
# {{†}} to [[love]] [[deeply]]; to [[cling]] to and be reluctant to leave
# {{†}} to [[make]] (someone to); to [[order]]
# {{†}} to [[cost]]
# {{†}} to [[live]] in a fixed place
# {{†}} {{n-g|Name of an ancient drinking vessel.}}
# {{†}} {{lb|zh|Min|Wu}} to [[need]] to; to [[ought]] to; [[should]]
# to be [[affect]]ed by; to be [[trouble]]d with
#* {{zh-x|著[着]{zháo}涼|to catch a cold}}
#* {{zh-x|著[着]{zháo}急|to worry}}
#* {{zh-x|著[着]{zháo}魔|[[enchanted]]; [[bewitched]]}}
#* {{zh-x|著[着]病|to become sick|MN}}
# {{†}} {{lb|zh|Hakka|Min}} to [[get]]; to [[receive]]
#* {{zh-x|著[着]獎|to win a prize|H}}
# {{lb|zh|dialectal Mandarin|Wu}} to [[fall asleep]]
#* {{zh-x|他 頭 一 沾 枕{zhěn}頭{tou} 就 '''著[着]{zháo}'''。|He '''falls asleep''' as soon as his head hits the pillow.}}
# {{†}} to [[fall into]] a [[trap]]; to be [[trap]]ped
# {{n-g|Particle denoting that an action was "appropriately done"; "not done in vain".}}
# {{n-g|Particle denoting the success or continuation of an action.}}
#* {{zh-x|書 找 '''著[着]{zháo}''' 了。|The book was ('''successfully''') found.}}
#* {{zh-x|書 找 不 '''著[着]{zháo}'''。|The book cannot be ('''successfully''') found.}}
#* {{zh-x|他 把 發動機 起 '''著[着]{zháo}''' 了。|He ('''successfully''') started the engine.}}
#* {{zh-x|油燈 沒 油 了，點 不 '''著[着]{zháo}''' 了。|There is no oil in the lamp, I can't light it.}}
# {{lb|zh|Beijing Mandarin}} {{n-g|Particle used after verbs to denote the severity of the event.}}
# {{lb|zh|Cantonese}} [[one by one]]
# {{lb|zh|Cantonese|Hakka|Min}} [[correct]]; [[right]]
# {{lb|zh|Min Dong}} [[at]]; [[in]] (a place)
# {{lb|zh|Min}} it's now ...'s [[turn]]
# {{lb|zh|dialectal Mandarin|Xiang}} (''zhāo'') [[all right]]; [[OK]]; that's exactly what I was thinking
# {{zh-alt-form|招|[[move]] (in [[Go]] games); [[step]]; [[trick]]; [[device]]}}
